SynapsePackage

Class AbstractSynapse

  • java.lang.Object
    • SynapsePackage.AbstractSynapse
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExternalSynapse, InternalSynapse

    public abstract class AbstractSynapse
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract synapse type for all sorts of synapses compartment and neuron here are post-synaptic

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractSynapse

        public AbstractSynapse(double weight,
                       SynapseForm stype,
                       AbstractCompartment compartment,
                       int synapseID,
                       double alpha)
        simply initialises weight and synapseType
        Parameters:
        weight - strength of synapse
        stype - nature of synapse (from SynapseForm.java)
        compartment - the compartment which this synapse targets
        synapseID - synapse identity (starts at 1)
        alpha - alpha value for this synapse

    • Method Detail

      • setupAlphaArray

        Set up the alpha array
